sub_034_ecology_02:
We just saw the Terastal energy reading from one
of the black crystals disappear a moment ago.\r
Do you know anything about that?![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_03: Whaaat?! You battled the Pokémon there?![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_04:
*sigh*
I thought I made it clear that it was too risky.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well, in any case, I’m just glad that you’re
OK, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_06:
Your efforts have helped us come to understand
the laws governing Terastal energy emissions.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_07:
Thanks for your help. I’m sending you something
as a thank-you gift.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_08:
Still, even after all this, it seems that the amount
of energy being emitted is slowly growing.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_09:
That means we may continue to see more black
crystals appear in the future.[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_10:
I don’t imagine you’ll listen to me even if I try to
stop you, so I won’t be too firm with you...[VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_11: but please continue to be careful out there![VAR 0114(002A)]
sub_034_ecology_12:
Ah, by the way, Director Clavell will be madder
than a rampaging Primeape if he finds out, so\r
let’s keep this between us two![VAR 0114(002A)]
